author: mark-grimes
body:
This is pull request #5720 with one line changed in

```
SLHCUpgradeSimulations/Configuration/python/combinedCustoms.py
```

One of the new "dev" imports replaced the normal one, when it should have been an additional line.  Otherwise the 2017 and 2019 non-dev workflows failed.

@boudoul
title: Minor modification to #5720
